column4: Has anyone tried running unreal 2004 with an ati card and fglrx?
how can I setup the kernel dri module for my radeon mobility 9000 card?
When might the new version of ati's fglrx drivers be available?
the default with ubuntu gives me 4k fps
radeon 7000 64mb
oh yeah, I had to comment out a line in xfree86-4, or whatever
Can you find that line, thanks a lot, I tried getting it to work before without any luck.
paste me that file, ill tell you
atleast what I had to do
kk
Hi, i'm back. I gave those settings a try and yes dri is working except it's a lot slower than with the fglrx drivers and more problematic.
Have you tried tweaking your settings at all the improve performance?
for what?
To improve 3d performance
all I did was comment out a line and change stuff that said generic to radeon
Oh ok, thanks anyways, I think i'll go back to the fglrx drivers as the frame rates are easily double that of the dri drivers.
what are you getting?
why so low, I get 4000+
What kind of card is that?
radeon 7000 64mb agp
1.2ghz 256 ram
This is radeon mobility 9000 32mb so I don't know. Hmm, I gotta believe I should be getting higher. I've got a centrino 1.3, 640mb ram.
